[skip] TODO: handle importcfg patching when os package is missing

go run -toolexec cover .
go tool cover -func=cover.out
cmp cover.out expect-cover.out

-- go.mod --
module test/main
-- main.go --
package main

func main() {
	var _ = 1
}
-- expect-cover.out --
mode: set
test/main/main.go:7.2,7.14 1 1
